title: Valmir (footballer, born 1979)
text:
Josue Dos Santos or simply Valmir (born 11 April 1979) is a Brazilian <a href="Association%20football">football</a> player. He currently plays for <a href="Brusque%20Futebol%20Clube">Brusque Futebol Clube</a>. Valmir is a central midfielder who plays in the holding midfield role or as an <a href="Midfielder%23Attacking%20midfielder">attacking midfielder</a>. Despite often being used in a defensive position, he is mainly an attacking player.
Football career.
In <a href="Brazil">Brazil</a> Josue Dos Santos played for <a href="Esporte%20Clube%20Bahia">Esporte Clube Bahia</a>. Valmir signed with Bulgarian <a href="Minyor%20Pernik">Minyor Pernik</a> together with young compatriot Leandro De Miranda Almeyda in July 2008. He made his debut in <a href="A%20PFG">Bulgarian A PFG</a> on 9 August 2008 in a match against <a href="Lokomotiv%20Sofia">Lokomotiv Sofia</a>. Valmir played for 90 minutes. The result of the match was a 0:1 loss for Minyor. On 23 August, the midfielder scored his first goal for Minyor against <a href="FC%20Lokomotiv%20Mezdra">Lokomotiv Mezdra</a>.
Valmir played for <a href="Associa%C3%A7%C3%A3o%20Chapecoense%20de%20Futebol">Associação Chapecoense de Futebol</a> in the 2007 <a href="Campeonato%20Catarinense">Campeonato Catarinense</a>.
